content.body: Who is the channel op of irc #whatwg on libera.chat? Can we set a topic and ask people to come here instead? Is it customary/proper to readonly the irc channel too?
nobody is, it’s unowned and can’t get an op unless everyone leaves
they can transfer the ownership in libera.chat
at least they say so in their site

content.body: this is what one of libera's mods said: "if the channel is opless we can op someone in the channel if everyone therein agrees, alternatively a project can claim a channel, which is another process."
